name: Web of Deceit: Deadly Sands - A Mysterious Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
name_original: Web of Deceit: Deadly Sands - A Mysterious Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

While visiting your uncle, you stumble upon a curious case. Men are vanishing, reappearing dead days later. Who killed them? Find out in this incredible Collector’s Edition!

• TRACK DOWN A VENOMOUS KILLER
Morgana, an evil black widow preys upon men by injecting them with spider venom! Her venom has no cure, so you must put a stop to her!

• YOUR UNCLE IS NOWHERE TO BE FOUND
After receiving a distressing message from your uncle, you travel to the remote village of Transvaal. You learn that he has been traveling the world, hunting down the deadly killer.

• TREAD CAREFULLY
The sands are always shifting and danger is around every corner. Are the murders actually the work of Morgana...or something even more sinister?

• TEAM UP WITH MORGANA IN AN EXCITING BONUS GAME!
Unlock the Collector’s Edition to gain access to the thrilling bonus chapter. Discover all of the great concept art and wallpapers too!
